title: He imagined an image of Allah & prays with that image in his head! assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from Bangladesh okay I was a person 
who during his ignorance actually imagined a   picture of Allah but he was a practicing back 
then but then he later started on prayer started   praying and when he started praying he actually 
like still had that image in his head and he   even used to worship that image but later on 
he found out like he realized that this is not   appropriate and he regretted it but the picture 
doesn't still seem to leave him and sometimes   when he's making like zikr he all of a sudden 
like finds this picture in his head and he gets   confused like is he still worshiping this picture 
I can lonely and this is scary picture of what   like he imagined Allah in a form in his head 
okay first of all first of all is it possible   for anyone to imagine Allah so any image 
that may cross your mind and yourself or   your subconscious or shaytan tells you that this 
is the image of Allah it's definitely not correct   yes correct so if you ever get these images when 
you're making thicker and it pops up like ads on   YouTube or whatever and you see them you simply 
smile and move on because this is not Allah no   matter how huge how big how this or that Allah is 
unlike whatever can cross your mind first of all   second of all you have to block these thoughts by 
not speaking to them by not speaking about them   nor acting upon them So speaking about them 
is going to your cousin and say listen cuz   um yesterday I was praying to hajjudan a image 
popped in front of me and I was saying imagine   that this is Allah azzawaja you spoke about it 
you're doomed end of story but if you blocked it   then Allah will forgive such intrusive thoughts 
you don't act upon it you don't recall these   images when you're making thicker and saying yeah 
this is Allah Allah I'm doing this whatever you   can imagine it cannot be Allah once you do this 
you're in the safe because Allah has forgiven   the ummah of prophet Muhammad for his sake 
for whatever intrusive thoughts that cross   their minds as long as they don't speak about 
them nor act upon them and Allah Knows Best and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
